item.title: Configure a proxy for Atom
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: In order to install packages from the internet a proxy needs to be set up if Internet connection is not directly available. Edit the file $HOME/.atom/.apmrc and add the following lines: ; Proxy https-proxy=http://your-proxy-host:your-proxy-port http-proxy=http://your-proxy-host:your-proxy-port strict-ssl=false

item.title: Use a proxy server on Android
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: When I’m connected with my mobile phone to a network that I don’t trust or has limited connection, I usually use my remote server as a web proxy to access the internet.
